Our team...

We are a truly interdisciplinary project involving plant scientists, computer scientists, agrifood experts, earth observation scientists and economists.

✎ Manage Staff Members

  • Prof. Aaron Golden (Co-PI)
    Aaron is an astronomer and physicist at the University of Galway with a background in AI & Data Science working in Earth Observation applications.
  • Prof. Charles Spillane (Co-PI)
    Charles is Director of the University of Galway's Ryan Institute with active research interests in AgResearch, Climate Science and Policy Development relevant to the UN's SDGs.
  • Dr. Dúalta Ó Fionnagáin
    Data Scientist Specializing in Earth Observation and Machine Learning for Climate-Resilient Agricultural Strategies
  • Jemima O'Farrell
    Data Engineer Specializing in Earth Observation, Machine Learning and Mapping
  • Dr. Louis Reymondin
    Louis co-leads the Digital transformation of the agri food systems research theme for the Alliance of Bioversity International and CIAT - he previously developed the Terra-i to map in real-time changes in surface biomass.
  • Dr. Michael Geever
    Data Scientist Specializing in Earth Observation and Machine Learning
  • Dr. Patricia Codyre
    Project Management and Policy Specialist
